version_description: • Wine details now include style, sweetness descriptor and varietal information.

What’s New in Version 3.0.1

• Updated exciting new design
• Barcode scanner now supporting iOS 8.0 and higher
• Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Favourites are now backed-up in iCloud which allows syncing across your devices.
• Export your product favourites to email
• Improved keyword search
• Barcode scanner improvements
• Bug fixes

• Enhanced Keyword Search with predictive results
• Improved Guided Search with extended 'refine' functionality
• Improved Store Search with location-based awareness (GPS)
• Near to real-time inventory (updated every 15 minutes)
• Unified Customer Accounts between App and LCBO.com

• User enhancements
• Bug fixes

• Now you can order products online within the LCBO App!
• Apple Pay is now available!
• Minor enhancements & bug fixes

• Now you can order products online within the LCBO App!
• Apple Pay is now available!

• Bug fixes and improved performance

• iPhone X support
• Minor enhancements & bug fixes

• Now you can add items directly to your cart from any results page. SImply swipe left to add to cart!
• Use your phone's camera to enter Credit Card details!

This version includes:
• compatibility with iOS 12.1 or later
• new wine varietal filter 
• ability to view more than 10 stores in store lists 
• new 'Shop' tab navigation for easier product category browsing 
• ability to filter and sort product lists for products being promoted 
• minor bug fixes

Now Aeroplan Members can earn 1 Aeroplan point for every $4 spent* in addition to bonus points on promotional offers. Points can be redeemed for travel to more than 1,300 destinations across the globe, plus hotels, car rentals, gift cards, merchandise and more.

This update includes:
• ability to earn Aeroplan points
• minor bug fixes.

*Not including HST, Container deposit, Gift Cards, or donations.
